About this item

  • Dark Hair ApplicationByhoo hair dye comb overcomes the problem of dark hair dying. We have tested our temporary hair chalk comb on dark hair to ensure that the bright colour could show up clearly. If you have brown, black, chestnut, or brunette hair, this semi-permanent is a perfect choice to satisfy your need.
  • Easy to ApplyByhoo hair dye comb has a brand new design compare with the others. We provide six combs, each of those combs could be fixed on the dye tube. And then you can squeeze the dye on the comb and use the comb to dye your hair from top to bottom.
  • Vibrant ColoulWe provide six bright colors include green, silver, yellow, red, purple, and blue. The combination of warm colors and cool colors can be used for various hairstyles. Use them togather or use the individual colour to get a beautiful layer of your hair color.
  • Safety and ProtectionByhoo hair dye consist of safety ingredients, and all of them could be found in common cosmetics. They are non-allergenic, non-toxic and water-soluble, and environment friendly. The hair dye is totally harmless to your hair and skin, You can feel safe to use it. And we provide Disposable gloves, shawls, and ear covers to protect your skin from stain.
  • Perfect Gift for girlBy colouring hair with this dye comb, girls could create a unique hairstyle with different tones. This makes this set of temporary hair chalk become a perfect gift for girls and kids. It can be a nice choice for daily hair beauty, birthday parties, Halloween costume parties, festivals, cosplay shows, or parties.

Product Description

First choice for dark hair

Dark hair application

The bright colour dye sometimes can be invisible on dark hair. Byhoo temporary Hair dye comb has overcome this challenge. We make a lot of tests to make sure the color is visible on the black hair. When you want to try a different color on your dark hair, this product is the first choice for you.

Previous page

  1. Fix The Comb

    1.Open the tube and fix the comb on the tube.

  2. Squeeze The Dye

    There is a hole between tube and comb, squeeze the dye on the comb.

  3. Dying Your Hair

    Grab a bunch of your hair, brush your hair with this comb.

  4. Dry Your Hair

    Dry your hair after brushing, the color with a stay on your hair

Next page

How to use

1 Step A 2 Step B 3 Step C 4 Step D

Perfect gift for girl, kid, teen

Byhoo Hair dye is a great choice for girls as a gift. Especially on a meaningful day like birthday, Christmas, Halloween, and Easter day. They can create unique looks and colourful hair to make this day special and memorable. The kids can express their imagination and creativity at the same time.

Protection

Although Byhoo temporary hair is safe and harmless for skin, we still prepare Disposable gloves, shawls, and ear-cover to protect your skin, and the color can't stain your hand clothes, and ear. But if you still worry about this, we will suggest you can wear black clothes. Just enjoy the fun!

Mutiple purpose

The effect of Byhoo semi-permanent dye is temporary and quick. For that reason, It is a great choice when you join the bar, party, and cosplay show. You can prepare to colour your hair one hour earlier before getting out. And then you can enjoy your great time.

Easy to wash

The hair dye is easy to wash. because this hair dye is water-soluble, you can easily wash it out with clear water and ordinary shampoo. And please remember dont let your hair touch the water except you don't want this hair color anymore.

Specifications

Color

Hair dye: red, silver, green, blue, purple, yellow

Comb: Black

Materials

Comb: plastic

Tube: plastic

Note

Be careful when you hold the dye tube. The tail of this tube is adamant.

You don't have to wet your hair, this dye could work on dry hair.

If you have any problem with this hair dye comb, please feel free to tell us. We will reply within 24 hours.

How customer reviews and ratings work

Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings, help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.
